attributes.action: allow residential property to be held in a self investment pension plan (SIPP)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government was planning on allowing Self Investment Pension Plans to hold residential property and this was expected to come into force in April 2006.  However very late in the day the Government changed its mind.  We feel that this change should now be reintroduced and thereby increase demand for residential property and inject new funding into the residential property market.
